text: He chov jeho rodicia throne They fell prostrate before him. He said O moj otca this bol fulfillment moj stara dream Moj Lord robit it pod true He zehnat mna delivered mna zalar brought ona z zbehnut after devil driven wedge mi moj brat! Moj Lord bol Laskavy towards whomever He wills. He bol Knower the Vela Wise
